epic.title: Basic Calculator Web Application
epic.description: Develop a cross-platform web-based calculator with core arithmetic operations, error handling, responsive UI, and keyboard support.

stories.title: Arithmetic Operations
stories.description: As a user, I want to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division so that I can get accurate calculation results.
acceptance_criteria: All operations produce results accurate to two decimal places
Supports positive/negative integer and decimal inputs

sub_tasks.title: Create operation buttons UI
sub_tasks.description: Design and implement UI buttons for all operations

sub_tasks.title: Unit testing for calculations
sub_tasks.description: Write Jest tests covering edge cases and precision validation

stories.title: Clear/Reset Functionality
stories.description: As a user, I want to clear all inputs and results so that I can start a new calculation.
acceptance_criteria: Display resets to "0" after clear action
All stored operation states are cleared
Works via both UI button and keyboard shortcut

sub_tasks.title: Design Clear button UI
sub_tasks.description: Implement clear button with accessible styling

sub_tasks.title: Develop reset logic
sub_tasks.description: Create function to reset calculator state

sub_tasks.title: Clear functionality testing
sub_tasks.description: Verify complete state reset in all scenarios

stories.title: Decimal Number Support
stories.description: As a user, I want to input decimal numbers so that I can perform precise calculations.
acceptance_criteria: Decimal point button correctly places decimal in display
Multiple decimals in single number are prevented
Calculations retain precision to two decimal places

sub_tasks.title: Add decimal button UI
sub_tasks.description: Implement decimal point button in keypad

sub_tasks.title: Develop decimal input logic
sub_tasks.description: Handle decimal validation and number parsing

stories.title: Keyboard Input Support
stories.description: As a power user, I want to use keyboard input so that I can perform calculations faster.

stories.title: Responsive Web UI
stories.description: As a mobile user, I want a responsive interface so that I can use the calculator on any device.
acceptance_criteria: Display area remains readable on all devices

sub_tasks.title: Create responsive layout
sub_tasks.description: Implement media queries for mobile breakpoints

stories.title: Division by Zero Error Handling
stories.description: As a user, I want clear error messages so that I understand invalid operations.
acceptance_criteria: Error persists until next valid input

sub_tasks.title: Error scenario tests
sub_tasks.description: Validate error states and recovery flow

stories.title: Calculation Display System
stories.description: As a user, I want to see my inputs and results clearly so that I can follow the calculation process.

sub_tasks.title: Implement display logic
sub_tasks.description: Develop state management for display updates
